item.title: Experts warn leftist celebrations of Charlie Kirk's death signal a dangerous mainstream shift in politics
item.description: Political analysts examine rising celebrations of opponents' deaths following Charlie Kirk's murder, questioning if such reactions are becoming normal...

item.title: 58 House Dems vote against resolution honoring 'life and legacy' of Charlie Kirk
item.description: Lawmakers voted to honor conservative activist Charlie Kirk, condemning political violence while sparring over responses to his death.

item.title: House passes Trump-backed plan to avert government shutdown
item.description: The House of Representatives passed a bill to punt the government funding deadline until Nov. 21 on Friday.

item.title: Russian jets carrying ballistic missiles violate Estonian airspace, foreign minister says
item.description: Russian jets carrying Kinzhal ballistic missiles breached Estonian airspace, prompting NATO interception and potential Article 4 consultation requests...

item.title: Trump calls antifa ‘terrorist group,’ fueling fight over free speech and limits of law enforcement
item.description: President Trump declares antifa a major terrorist organization, sparking debate among experts about constitutional implications and enforcement challe...
